tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE submissions (submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_id INT, submission_date DATE, submission_content TEXT)
CREATE TABLE reviews (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, submission_id INT, reviewer_id INT, review_date DATE, review_content TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES submissions(submission_id))

CREATE TABLE submissions (
  submission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id UUID,
  submission_date DATE,
  submission_title VARCHAR,
  submission_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id UUID,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  review_date DATE,
  review_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE submissions (
  submission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id UUID,
  submission_title TEXT,
  submission_content TEXT,
  submission_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id UUID,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  review_content TEXT,
  review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
  rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id UUID,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  rating FLOAT,
  rating_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE submissions (
    submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    submission_date DATE,
    submission_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    review_date DATE,
    review_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    rating_value INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES submissions(submission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    submission_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (submission_id) REFERENCES submissions(submission_id)
);
